heroSubtitle: Join us in beautiful Punta Cana, Dominican Republic
resortDescription: A luxurious all-inclusive resort nestled on the pristine shores of Bavaro Beach, where we'll be celebrating our special day. We (Yasmim & Casey) will be staying April 8th - 13th and would be thrilled to spend this time with you!
resortDetails: Located on the world-renowned Bavaro Beach, the Grand Bavaro Princess boasts {{suites}} spacious suites, {{restaurants}} themed restaurants, and {{bars}} bars set within an ecological complex that respects the native vegetation and wildlife.

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.description: Join us as we exchange vows in an intimate beachfront ceremony overlooking the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean Sea. The ceremony will take place on the resort's pristine beach with the gentle sound of waves as our soundtrack.

reception.title: Reception
reception.description: Celebrate with us during our romantic reception! We're planning either an intimate private dinner on the beach under the stars or a semi-private dinner in one of the resort's exquisite restaurants. Stay tuned for final details!

stayDescription: While our wedding is on {{weddingDate}}, we're making this a true celebration by staying at the resort for several days. We would be absolutely thrilled if you join us for any part of this time!

timeline.title: Your Timeline
timeline.description: Stay for any length that works for you

qualityTime.title: Quality Time
qualityTime.description: Pool days, beach walks, and memories

stayMessage: ðŸ’™ Whether you come just for the wedding day or stay the whole time with us, we're just excited to celebrate this special moment with the people we love most!
planStayDescription: We're not reserving a block of rooms, giving you the freedom to choose your perfect accommodation and stay for any length of time you desire. We'll be there April 8th - 13th and would love to spend as much time as possible celebrating with you!

ourStay.title: Our Stay & Suggestions
ourStay.suggestion: Stay for any duration that works for you - even just the wedding day!

airport.title: Airport
airport.description: Fly into Punta Cana International Airport (PUJ) - only 25 minutes from the resort

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: A valid passport is required. Please check entry requirements for your country

weather.title: Weather
weather.description: April averages 82Â°F with sunshine - perfect beach weather!

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Dominican Peso (DOP) or US Dollar widely accepted

locationDescription: Grand Bavaro Princess is located on the famous Bavaro Beach in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic - one of the world's most beautiful beaches.
